definition: wet feed, especially for pigs, consisting of mostly kitchen waste mixed with water or milk, to drink large quantities of

noun
- wet feed, especially for pigs, consisting of mostly kitchen waste mixed with water or milk
= example: wet feed, especially for pigs, consisting of mostly kitchen waste mixed with water or milk
= synonyms: slops
verb
- to drink large quantities of
